ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.88"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="eScene.09" Location type (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5 NEMSISCodeSystem)

See NEMSIS recommended subset at http://nemsis.org/v3/resources.html
